intro: Ternstroemia pseudoverticillata, commonly known as the false verticillate ternstroemia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Theaceae. It is native to Southeast Asia, particularly found in countries like Thailand and Vietnam. The plant is characterized by its dense, clustered inflorescences and small, white to pale yellow flowers. Its leaves are typically opposite and elliptical, with a smooth margin. It is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and delicate floral display.
